name: Parlez vous Français? This way, please -->
description: Redirect your customers to pages and links relevant to them, in languages they speak. It works in any language BTW.

name: Look at the time!
description: Need to show a different link depending on the current time of day? No problem. The hardest choice to make will be whether its your time or their time (you can choose, of course).

name: Sorry, we’re not talking to you.
description: Limiting your links reach based on a country? Choose to invite-only or ban certain users based on the countries they come from.

name: iOS? To the App Store!
description: Redirect users based on their device, browser, and anything else you’d like that you find in the user-agent.
